page.mod_title: Course Introduction and CHK Search Overview

text_content.paragraph: In CHK Search, related assets are categorized into groups, and are organized under the Wells/Sites, Contracts, Leases and Map tabs. The Wells/Sites, Contracts, and Leases tabs share a similar layout, while the Map tab’s layout is slightly different in that the Search Results Toolbar and Search Criteria Types are located along the top of the interface. And the Data Grid displays search results in tabs. More on this later.
Click on each of the numbers on the screenshots below to identify each area.
